body:
Hi, 

I am having some trouble using the glazing creator with big buildings (over 10 stores). I am analyzing urban form on my phd, so I need to simulate a lot of zones at the same time. 

What happens is that when i tried to generate the glazing over an certain amount of zones Rhino shuts down. 

Can some one help me?

replies.body:
Hi Marcelo,

You can check some of the nice discussions:

[1](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/limit-to-decomposing-zones), [2](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/honeybee-eplus-crash-exception-of-type-system), [3](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/massing-studies-with-honeybee-speed-of-zone-and-window-creation), [4](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/glazing-creator-crash)



best,

Omid
